sentences.en: He is blessed in having such a good wife.
sentences.cn: 他有幸娶到如此一位贤妻.

sentences.en: He lost his beloved wife last year.
He was laid to rest beside his late wife.
He was taken up with the reconciliation of husband and wife.
sentences.cn: 他忙于做夫妻间的调解工作.

sentences.en: He's grieving over his dead wife and son.
sentences.cn: 他因丧妻失子而悲痛不已。

sentences.en: His ex-wife reported him to police a few days later.
sentences.cn: 他的前妻几天后向警方告发了他。

sentences.en: Husband and wife are now taxed separately on their incomes.
sentences.cn: 现在夫妻双方分别按各自的收入纳税。

sentences.en: Husband and wife turned coldly accusing backs toward each other.
sentences.cn: 这两口子冷冷地背向而坐,互相埋怨.

sentences.en: Husband and wife were similarly successful in their chosen careers.
sentences.cn: 夫妇俩在各自所选择的事业上都很成功。

sentences.en: I wrote to my ex-wife. She was very civilised about it.
sentences.cn: 我给前妻写了封信。她对此很通情达理。

sentences.en: I'm very fond of Maurice and I'd make him a good wife.
sentences.cn: 我非常喜欢莫里斯，我会成为他的贤内助的。

sentences.en: My ex-wife deliberately sabotages my access to the children.
sentences.cn: 我的前妻蓄意阻挠我见孩子。

sentences.en: They lived together as husband and wife for years.
sentences.cn: 他们结为夫妇,共同生活了很多年.

words.tran_cn: 适于做妻子的；像妻的；妻的

phrases.tran_cn: 非常年轻的妻子，(老夫的)少妻；童养媳

trans.tran_en: the woman that a man is married to
